CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, page 4, reads: "Valentine Greeting - Pittsburghers Francine Thomas, Clementine Scott, Ida Eliibe and Marie Hodges enjoy a homemade Valentine as only children can. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Four boys, including one on left wearing light colored long sleeved shirt and dark pants, using scissors to cut large two toned heart, gathered around table with open book in interior with door with curtain, bookshelf, and five portraits of young women, possibly in the Kay Boys Club
